articles.title: Video Game Predictions for 2025; Hollow Knight Silksong, Half-Life To Return, Major Ubisoft Changes - Wccftech
articles.description: There have been a lot of video game predictions for 2025 thus far, with some being more realistic whereas others are outlandish.
articles.content: We've brought in the new year, and we are now in 2025, where there are plenty of big-name titles that are set to release. There have already been a number of predictions, especially when it comes to … [+2520 chars]
